author: wn.com
title: Donald Trump 'would be amazing for women in this country'
text: GOP presidential front-runner Donald Trump's daughter Ivanka is hitting the campaign trail on her father's behalf, looking to reassure the public that her dad is no misogynist. " He'd be amazing for women in the country. He would be incredible for women in the country, " Ms. Trump said in an
